createact.name: CreateAct
createact.description: Grants permission to create a new AI task (act) within a session that can interact with tools and perform specific actions

createsession.name: CreateSession
createsession.description: Grants permission to create a new session context within a workflow run to manage conversation state and acts

createworkflowdefinition.name: CreateWorkflowDefinition
createworkflowdefinition.description: Grants permission to create a new workflow definition template that can be used to execute multiple workflow runs

createworkflowrun.name: CreateWorkflowRun
createworkflowrun.description: Grants permission to create a new execution instance of a workflow definition with specified parameters

deleteworkflowdefinition.name: DeleteWorkflowDefinition
deleteworkflowdefinition.description: Grants permission to delete a workflow definition and all associated resources

deleteworkflowrun.name: DeleteWorkflowRun
deleteworkflowrun.description: Grants permission to terminate and clean up a workflow run, stopping all associated acts and sessions

getworkflowdefinition.name: GetWorkflowDefinition
getworkflowdefinition.description: Grants permission to retrieve details and configuration of a specific workflow definition

getworkflowrun.name: GetWorkflowRun
getworkflowrun.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current state, configuration, and execution details of a workflow run

invokeactstep.name: InvokeActStep
invokeactstep.description: Grants permission to execute the next step of an act, processing tool call results and returning new tool calls if needed

listacts.name: ListActs
listacts.description: Grants permission to list all acts within a specific session with their current status and execution details

listmodels.name: ListModels
listmodels.description: Grants permission to list all available AI models that can be used for workflow execution, including their status and compatibility information

listsessions.name: ListSessions
listsessions.description: Grants permission to list all sessions within a specific workflow run

listworkflowdefinitions.name: ListWorkflowDefinitions
listworkflowdefinitions.description: Grants permission to list all workflow definitions in your account with optional filtering and pagination

listworkflowruns.name: ListWorkflowRuns
listworkflowruns.description: Grants permission to list all workflow runs for a specific workflow definition with optional filtering and pagination

updateact.name: UpdateAct
updateact.description: Grants permission to update an existing act's configuration, status, or error information

updateworkflowrun.name: UpdateWorkflowRun
updateworkflowrun.description: Grants permission to update the configuration or state of an active workflow run
